block.p: SCHNELL-Nathan. On October 24, 2000 in Paris. Beloved husband of Bernice. Loving father of Lloyd Schnell, Stuart Schnell and Laurie Blake. Father-in-law of Ellie, Diane and Paul. Cherished grandfather to Ron & Staci, Amy, Jody, Arielle, Camille, and great-grandfather to Jeremy. Services Sunday 11:45AM at ''The Riverside'', 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. Visiting hours Saturday, 7-9PM.
